Reviews.Title: Damaged item
Reviews.Author: Pinky
Reviews.Content: phone was defective, motherboard was damaged phone not working.  Beware of this seller.  Still awaiting a reply from the seller regarding a refund.  The white shell covering the phone was in tact giving the appearance phone was in good shape.  Phone fell apart.  The motherboard had scratches and bumps all over.  Phone was delayed and did not work properly.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT GET THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: Daisy
Reviews.Content: So, I bought this phone because I already had a t-mobile sim card to go with it even though it was unlocked and I got the phone today and called to have it activated and they told me that the phone is NOT a t-mobile phone. So I can't even use it. I am very upset because the phone was expensive to not be able to use it. I  am returning it as soon as I can.

Reviews.Title: No company support!
Reviews.Author: Olivia McPherson
Reviews.Content: When I received this phone, it started off working ok.  It DOES NOT support blackberry 6.0 so if you got used to apps and layouts on that, sorry; you'll have to go back to square one.  Ok, that was annoying, but I figured I could stick with it.  Two and a half months later, half of the keys stopped working, leaving me unable to do all of the things I should be able to do with a blackberry.  Not only could I not text, I couldn't even check my voice mail!It mysteriously resolved itself two days later, and I thought great! All set.Until it happened again last week, a few *days* after my "warranty" expired. When I wrote to the company, I received this reply:"Our apologies. This certainly is not normal. This item came with a 90 day warranty, unfortunately that is up at this time."No help? No repair? No replacement? No more business from me; and not you, either, if you're smart.

Reviews.Title: On time & works A.W.E.S.O.M.E
Reviews.Author: Dead Pool
Reviews.Content: The package came sooner than I thought, and when we opened the box it was like brand new. In complete package with details on how to work the phone, headphones etc. Phone looks very clean and works great, not a single problem with it and its been close to a month since I've had it.

Reviews.Title: Phone Review
Reviews.Author: Sodeyemi
Reviews.Content: Phone is excellent, I Loved It. Small, Sleek, and great design. The battery life is capable for the most part, i dont play music on the phone

Reviews.Title: Stick to OEM products.
Reviews.Author: luciano
Reviews.Content: The casing feels cheap and has that crappy after-market look. Not like the picture. There's spaces between the case and the white plastic screen bezel. No happy.

Reviews.Title: BROKE
Reviews.Author: Joseph Ochoa
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM BROKE WITHIN THE YEAR BUT THE COMPANY MADE A STUPID EXCUSE SO WE THREW IT AWAY DONT BUY THIS

Reviews.Title: Not what I had ordered!
Reviews.Author: Joel Saltzman
Reviews.Content: I ordered what was advertised as a T-Mobile branded Blackberry 8520. As only the TM branded 8520 supports UMA wifi which is my requirement, an OEM model would not do for me. The device shipped was not an T-Mobile branded device, which was not what was advertised, and did not have the feature that I had ordered it for. Amazon did take it back and credit me so I have no beef with their service itself. I was just not sent what was advedrtised.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: oscar
Reviews.Content: Excelent product everything's good I,m very satisfaced sito it. I recomend tris product to all people that want it. Good

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: HOOVER LOZANO
Reviews.Content: Is good the telephone is ok ok ok and good business is ok ok ok ok ok ok ok ok

Reviews.Title: blackberry curve
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Requillo "Daddy k"
Reviews.Content: arrive not on time was expected,, was arrive in new year 2013...disapointedGooday & happy new year god bless peace.

Reviews.Title: I don't know about this phone
Reviews.Author: Amelia J. Johnsen
Reviews.Content: some kind error keep appearing on the screen and sometimes it didn't work, and other times it worked. This phone only lasted for 2 months without errors popping up, then I had to order another one for my son.

Reviews.Title: Hated it...
Reviews.Author: AllStar87
Reviews.Content: first of all, i know phones, ive had many cell phones and 1 blackberry before, but when i opened this it was not new. and if it was it looked like it had been through some things before getting in the box, and the software on it is what made me return it. It looked cheap in everyway. dont even waste your time, i advice you !!! im still looking 4a good blackberry too, but i dnt think ill find it here.

Reviews.Title: excelente telefono
Reviews.Author: kiaranieves
Reviews.Content: soy de venezuela, el equipo me llego en optimas condiciones, es nuevo como decia la publicación y funciona perfectamente muchas gracias

Reviews.Title: gteat phone!
Reviews.Author: ED
Reviews.Content: It came quickly and it works like a charm. It's got plenty of memory and I love this phone.  I really love Blackberry and this phone is Blackberry at its finest. Get this phone if you want a great phone at a great price, buy this phone

Reviews.Title: Buenos dias
Reviews.Author: Ana Lourdes Flores
Reviews.Content: Buenos dias aun no tengo calificacion para este producto, realmente me gustaria que colocaran mas especificaciones sobre el producto que se esta ofertando yo deseo realizar la compra pero tengo dudas sobre el producto hasta el momento se ve bien pero deseo mayor informacion y mas imagenes del producto gracias...
